tool_description: Generates comprehensive service quality scores for carriers based on delivery performance, customer feedback, and service reliability metrics.

delivery_analysis_id.description: Reference ID for delivery time analysis results

scoring_weights.description: Weights for different quality factors (must sum to 100)

minimum_feedback_count.description: Minimum number of feedback entries required

error_messages: Invalid analysis reference: The delivery analysis ID cannot be found or has expired.
Insufficient customer feedback: Not enough feedback data meets the minimum count requirement.
Invalid scoring weights: Weights must be positive numbers that sum to 100.
Invalid quality dimension: Supported dimensions include timeliness, packaging, communication, tracking, resolution.
Feedback source unavailable: The specified customer feedback source is not accessible.
usage: Provide delivery_analysis_id and customer_feedback_source. Optionally customize scoring_weights and quality_dimensions to focus on specific service aspects.

overall_quality_scores.description: Overall quality scores by carrier (0-100 scale)

dimension_scores.description: Detailed scores for each quality dimension

quality_trends.description: Identified trends in service quality over time
